name: 幸存者幻想曲 Survivor Fantasia
name_original: 幸存者幻想曲 Survivor Fantasia
description:
Game Introduction

"Survivor's Fantasia" is a vampire-themed game that combines elements of light tower defense. In the game, players can choose from over 10 survivor characters and utilize a combination of more than 50 cards, 20+ consumables, and various combat professions to fend off approaching hordes of monsters, while also challenging powerful bosses and striving to survive.

Game Features

Diverse Gameplay: The game combines elements of light tower defense, RPG, and more, offering players a diverse range of strategies and tactical experiences.
Traps/Terrain: The game includes various traps and terrain that players can utilize to hinder monster advances, adding strategic depth to the gameplay.
Active Items: Players can use active items such as walls, bushes, magic books, bombs, etc., to alter the terrain or enhance their own abilities, thereby changing the course of the battle.
Boss Battles: Boss fights in the game test players' ability to use items effectively, requiring them to cleverly utilize various items and combat strategies to defeat powerful bosses.
Career Choices: The game offers five career options, including warrior, assassin, mage, archer, and summoner. The choice of career affects the effects of certain cards, adding diversity to the combat strategies.
Fast-paced: Game sessions have a duration of 15 minutes.
